categories.label: Station Data
categories.description: These options apply only to the station data displayed on the map. Gridded map products are generated using partial filled station data.

value.label: Monthly
value.description: Data measured at a monthly time scale

selector.label: Data Fill
selector.description: The type of processing the station data goes through.

value.label: Partial Filled
value.description: This data has undergone QA/QC and is partially filled using statistical techniques to estimate some missing station values.
